VarUIntArrayTraits¶

class zserio.array.VarUIntArrayTraits[source]¶

Bases: object

Array traits for Zserio varuint type.

Attributes Summary

HAS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT

Methods Summary

bitSizeOf(_bitPosition, value) Returns length of Zserio varuint type stored in the bit stream in bits.
initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value) Initializes indexed offsets for Zserio varuint type.
read(reader, _index) Reads Zserio varuint type from the bit stream.
write(writer, value) Writes Zserio varuint type to the bit stream.

Attributes Documentation

HAS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = False¶

Methods Documentation

static bitSizeOf(_bitPosition, value)[source]¶

Returns length of Zserio varuint type stored in the bit stream in bits.

Parameters:
  • _bitPosition – Not used.
  • value – Zserio varuint type value.
Returns:

Length of given Zserio varuint type in bits.
static initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value)[source]¶

Initializes indexed offsets for Zserio varuint type.

Parameters:
  • bitPosition – Current bit stream position.
  • value – Zserio varuint type value.
Returns:

Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after Zserio varuint type.
static read(reader, _index)[source]¶

Reads Zserio varuint type from the bit stream.

Parameters:
  • reader – Bit stream from which to read.
  • _index – Not used.
static write(writer, value)[source]¶

Writes Zserio varuint type to the bit stream.

Parameters:
  • writer – Bit stream where to write.
  • value – Zserio varuint type to write.
